items.title: With the submit button outside the input
With no submit or clear buttons
Advanced usage with the submit button outside the input

props.name: children
props.docblock: specifies the nested child elements. At a minimum, `SearchField.Label` and `SearchField.Input` are required.

description.text: specifies the nested child elements. At a minimum, `SearchField.Label` and `SearchField.Input` are required.

props.name: onSubmit
props.docblock:
specifies a callback function for when the `SearchField` is submitted by the user. For example:
  ```jsx
  <SearchField onSubmit={(value) => { console.log(value); } />
  ```

description.text:
specifies a callback function for when the `SearchField` is submitted by the user. For example:
  ```jsx
  <SearchField onSubmit={(value) => { console.log(value); } />
  ```

props.name: className
props.docblock: specifies a custom class name.

description.text: specifies a custom class name.

props.name: onBlur
props.docblock:
specifies a callback function for when the user loses focus in the `SearchField` component. The default is an empty function. For example:
  ```jsx
  <SearchField onBlur={event => console.log(event)} />
  ```

description.text:
specifies a callback function for when the user loses focus in the `SearchField` component. The default is an empty function. For example:
  ```jsx
  <SearchField onBlur={event => console.log(event)} />
  ```

props.name: onChange
props.docblock:
specifies a callback function for when the value in `SearchField` is changed by the user. The default is an empty function. For example:
  ```jsx
  <SearchField onChange={value => console.log(value)} />
  ```

description.text:
specifies a callback function for when the value in `SearchField` is changed by the user. The default is an empty function. For example:
  ```jsx
  <SearchField onChange={value => console.log(value)} />
  ```

props.name: onClear
props.docblock:
specifies a callback function for when the value in `SearchField` is cleared by the user. The default is an empty function. For example:
  ```jsx
  <SearchField onClear={() => console.log('search cleared')} />
  ```

description.text:
specifies a callback function for when the value in `SearchField` is cleared by the user. The default is an empty function. For example:
  ```jsx
  <SearchField onClear={() => console.log('search cleared')} />
  ```

props.name: onFocus
props.docblock:
specifies a callback function for when the user focuses in the `SearchField` component. The default is an empty function. For example:
  ```jsx
  <SearchField onFocus={event => console.log(event)} />
  ```

description.text:
specifies a callback function for when the user focuses in the `SearchField` component. The default is an empty function. For example:
  ```jsx
  <SearchField onFocus={event => console.log(event)} />
  ```

props.name: screenReaderText
props.docblock: specifies the screenreader text for both the clear and submit buttons (e.g., for i18n translations). The default is `{ label: 'search', clearButton: 'clear search', searchButton: 'submit search' }`.

description.text: specifies the screenreader text for both the clear and submit buttons (e.g., for i18n translations). The default is `{ label: 'search', clearButton: 'clear search', searchButton: 'submit search' }`.

props.name: value
props.docblock: specifies the initial value for the input. The default is an empty string.

description.text: specifies the initial value for the input. The default is an empty string.

props.name: icons
props.docblock: specifies the icon element(s) to use for the clear and submit buttons.

description.text: specifies the icon element(s) to use for the clear and submit buttons.

props.name: formAriaLabel
props.docblock: specifies the aria-label attribute on the form element. This is useful if you use the `SearchField` component more than once on a page.

description.text: specifies the aria-label attribute on the form element. This is useful if you use the `SearchField` component more than once on a page.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: Specifies whether the `SearchField` is disabled.

description.text: Specifies whether the `SearchField` is disabled.

props.name: submitButtonLocation
props.docblock: Controls whether the search button is internal as an icon or external as a button.

description.text: Controls whether the search button is internal as an icon or external as a button.

props.name: className
props.docblock: specifies a custom class name.

description.text: specifies a custom class name.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: specifies the placeholder text for the input.

description.text: specifies the placeholder text for the input.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
specifies the label to use for the input field (e.g., for i18n translations). Note: if `children` is not provided,
a screenreader-only label will be used in its placed based on the `screenReaderText.label` prop for `SearchField.Advanced`.

description.text:
specifies the label to use for the input field (e.g., for i18n translations). Note: if `children` is not provided,
a screenreader-only label will be used in its placed based on the `screenReaderText.label` prop for `SearchField.Advanced`.

props.name: variant
props.docblock: The button style variant to use.

description.text: The button style variant to use.

props.name: submitButtonLocation
props.docblock: Controls whether the search button is internal as an icon or external as a button.

description.text: Controls whether the search button is internal as an icon or external as a button.

props.name: buttonText
props.docblock:
Specifies a text that is displayed on the button.
The `submitButtonLocation` prop should be set to `external`.

description.text:
Specifies a text that is displayed on the button.
The `submitButtonLocation` prop should be set to `external`.

props.docblock:
Specifies a callback function for when the `SearchField` is submitted by the user. For example:

```jsx
<SearchField onSubmit={(value) => { console.log(value); } />
```

description.text:

```jsx

```

props.name: label
props.docblock: Specifies the label to use for the input field (e.g., for i18n translations).

description.text: Specifies the label to use for the input field (e.g., for i18n translations).

props.docblock: Specifies a custom class name.

description.text: Specifies a custom class name.

props.docblock:
Specifies a callback function for when the user loses focus in the
`SearchField` component. The default is an empty function. For example:

```jsx

```

props.docblock:
Specifies a callback function for when the value in `SearchField`
is changed by the user. The default is an empty function. For example:

```jsx
<SearchField onChange={value => console.log(value)} />
```

Specifies a callback function for when the value in `SearchField`
is cleared by the user. The default is an empty function. For example:

props.name: onFocus
props.docblock:
Specifies a callback function for when the user focuses in the `SearchField`
component. The default is an empty function. For example:

```jsx
<SearchField onFocus={event => console.log(event)} />
```

description.text:

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: Specifies the placeholder text for the input.

description.text: Specifies the placeholder text for the input.

props.name: screenReaderText
props.docblock:
Specifies the screenreader text for both the clear and submit buttons
(e.g., for i18n translations). The default is `{ label: 'search',
clearButton: 'clear search', searchButton: 'submit search' }`.

description.text:
Specifies the screenreader text for both the clear and submit buttons
(e.g., for i18n translations). The default is `{ label: 'search',
clearButton: 'clear search', searchButton: 'submit search' }`.

props.name: value
props.docblock: Specifies the initial value for the input. The default is an empty string.

description.text: Specifies the initial value for the input. The default is an empty string.

props.name: icons
props.docblock:
Specifies the icon element(s) to use for the clear and submit buttons.
The default is:

```jsx
{
  submit: import {Search} from '@edx/paragon/icons';,
  clear: import {Close} from '@edx/paragon/icons'.
}
```

description.text:
Specifies the icon element(s) to use for the clear and submit buttons.
The default is:

```jsx
{
  submit: import {Search} from '@edx/paragon/icons';,
  clear: import {Close} from '@edx/paragon/icons'.
}
```

props.name: formAriaLabel
props.docblock:
Specifies the aria-label attribute on the form element.
This is useful if you use the `SearchField` component more than once on a page.

description.text:
Specifies the aria-label attribute on the form element.
This is useful if you use the `SearchField` component more than once on a page.

props.docblock: Props to be passed to the form input

The `submitButtonLocation` prop should be set to `external`.
